title: Hour 2 - Pat McAfee
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Pat McAfee
description:
Dan talks with former NFL Punter turned Media Mogul Pat McAfee about his career and his thoughts on the NFL season. Dan reflects on Deshaun Watson's suspension.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
